meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Chelsea Hill Robert Perez Jonathan Dinerstein Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7900.

td.p: Chelsea Hill, an administrative assistant from Brooklyn, New York
Robert Perez, a proposal manager from Fairfield, Iowa
Jonathan Dinerstein, a composer from Los Angeles, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $62,902)

tr.td: 2019 HOLIDAYS & OBSERVANCES
SUMMING UP THE SHAKESPEARE PLAY
ALLITERATION
19th CENTURY OCCUPATIONS
GEOGRAPHICALLY SPEAKING
GOTTA RUN!

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
